User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user account within the MediaFlow application, including their personal details and authorization configuration for role-based access control.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity (Firebase UID).

role.description: The assigned strategic role (strategic | sales | production | admin | null).

permittedPhases.description: A list of phases the user is permitted to access.

strategicPermit.description: Master switch enabling access to the system features.

status.description: Current status of the user's account.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the user account was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the user account was last updated.

definition.description: Primary identity registry. Security rules check custom claims derived from this document's permit state.
